message.raw:
~~[https://www.dropbox.com/home/VRX/Sensors](https://www.dropbox.com/home/VRX/Sensors)~~[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/9ura8lnrdrtmy6d/AABG2-3BHEFgkb4-GlNTiAeca?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/9ura8lnrdrtmy6d/AABG2-3BHEFgkb4-GlNTiAeca?dl=0)

The 3D lidar should be mounted on a post. In the future, teams might be able to select the pose of the sensor.

Make sure to visualize the 3D lidar to make sure that the 3D mesh is not occluding an important part of the beams. I’m assuming that the cases will occlude some rays but that might be expected.
message.html:
https://www.dropbox.com/home/VRX/Sensorshttps://www.dropbox.com/sh/9ura8lnrdrtmy6d/AABG2-3BHEFgkb4-GlNTiAeca?dl=0

The 3D lidar should be mounted on a post. In the future, teams might be able to select the pose of the sensor.

Make sure to visualize the 3D lidar to make sure that the 3D mesh is not occluding an important part of the beams. I’m assuming that the cases will occlude some rays but that might be expected.
